name: Twitter Components
description:
I designed this during the lockdowns and wasn't able to publish. I came back to it after Figma allowed everyone to publish and I've updated it with the knowledge I have gained about auto-layout, responsiveness and component variants.


Some features include:

  1. Fully responsive content, cards and frames
  2. Component variants enabled
  3. Auto-layout additions
  4. Dark mode


Note: best to use Helvetica font family to access text editing.


Thank you for duplicating, sharing and leaving your comments.


Do follow me on Twitter at @seyioniyitan
